synopsis.text: Voice actresses Aya Suzaki and Asuka Nishi, known for their lively and entertaining radio program 'SuzakiNishi', are set to bring their charm to the small screen with a television anime adaptation. The duo, who play airhead Aya Suzaki and happy-go-lucky Asuka Nishi, will transfer to a high school in Tokyo, where every day is filled with joy and laughter. The anime, titled 'Suzakinishi The AanimationN', will air on Tokyo MX TV, TV Kanazawa, and Sun TV, starting in July. Originally aired on Nippon Cultural Broadcasting's internet radio station 'Ch≈ç! A&G+', the radio program features the pair discussing and proposing new business ideas, promising a unique and engaging viewing experience for the anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
